title: Phone shuts down at 13% battery but reboots to a 54% battery?
content:
For a while now my phone has been shutting down when there still appears to be battery charge remaining.

Just now for example, I was on 13% - and it just went into it's shutdown cycle - as it was doing this I plugged in the charger and rebooted. 

After its usual boot cycle the phone came back on with a battery displaying 53% 

Total time from shutdown to reboot? A few minutes at most.

Now, am in to believe that in those couple of minutes the battery suddenly gained 40% charge?

Seems a bit odd to me. 

Any thoughts on this?
